short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Email current webpage. Website title becomes the subject and website URL becomes the message body.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension provides a convenient way to compose and send emails using information from the active tab. Upon activation, the Extension launches Gmail in a new tab, with the current webpage's title automatically set as the email subject and the URL inserted into the email body. This allows users to effortlessly communicate with intended recipients by simply filling out the designated "To:" field.
